dict.acceptation: 黑（色）的；黑色人种的；黑暗的；不加牛奶的；
使变黑；抵制；拒绝；使变黑暗；

sent.orig: In "the black cat"the adjective "black" modifies the noun "cat".
sent.trans: 在the black cat这一词组中，形容词black修饰名词cat。

sent.orig: Black in black cat is an attributive.
sent.trans: black cat中的black是修饰性形容词。

sent.orig: Black-Scholes pricing model has no analytical formula of American put options,thus it cannot get accurate solution.
sent.trans: Black-Scholes定价模型对美式看跌期权不存在解析公式，无法求其精确解。

sent.orig: The findings documented in Smith (1985) are found to be at variance with Black (1979).
sent.trans: 人们发现在Smith(1985)文献中提出的结果与Black(1979)的不同。

sent.orig: Black-Scholes pricing model has been designed in the essay.
sent.trans: 其次对布莱克(Black)—斯科尔斯(Scholes)定价模型公式设计出了计算程序。
